attributes.action: Award Richard Griffiths a Knighthood for Services to Drama
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stalwart British actor, Richard Griffiths has had critical acclaim for TV, stage and film work for numerous years. Griffiths is best known on film for The History Boys and With Nail and I; and on TV for Pie in the Sky. He is also a Tony and Olivier Award winning thespian. Griffiths was an actor with the RSC for several years and was most recently in the West End revival of Equus.
